notes.body: Hello Sagar.      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regard to promotional SMS, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.     Please be assured, I have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number 7011070489 from receiving promotional SMS. It will take 3 working days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information. Also, if you have a dual sim phone, I would request you to help us with the second number as well. We will forward a request for the other number as well.      Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email ID too, I request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.     I certainly hope this helps and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Sagar.

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regard to promotional SMS, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.

Please be assured, I have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number 7011070489 from receiving promotional SMS. It will take 3 working days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information. Also, if you have a dual sim phone, I would request you to help us with the second number as well. We will forward a request for the other number as well. 

Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email ID too, I request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.

I certainly hope this helps and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Maheshwari,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern in reagrds to the order #655966288241037312-92335.Our partner doctor tried contacting you multiple times. However, he was unable to connect with you.    However, I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid a doctor consultation.    To know more about the valid prescription, please visit the link mentioned below.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/general-enquiries-43000348790/what-is-a-valid-prescription--43000187796  ​  Further, kindly update any active delivery number by visiting the manage address page before placing a new order, so that our teleconsultation team will connect you to the updated delivery number.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello Maheshwari,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern in reagrds to the order #655966288241037312-92335.Our partner doctor tried contacting you multiple times. However, he was unable to connect with you. 

However, I request you to place a new order with an active number, or you may upload a valid prescription to avoid a doctor consultation. 

To know more about the valid prescription, please visit the link mentioned below.
https://pharmeasy.in/help/general-enquiries-43000348790/what-is-a-valid-prescription--43000187796
​
Further, kindly update any active delivery number by visiting the manage address page before placing a new order, so that our teleconsultation team will connect you to the updated delivery number.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 08071324888.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy.

Regards,
Tahera

notes.body_html:
Hello Pooja,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #655405813555097600-56082, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 07th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

We request you to confirm whether you have received the order or not for further assistance?
 
We had written to you asking for confirmation above with reference to the earlier email. However, we have not received any reply from you. Hence, we are closing this case. 
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.
​
Thank you for being a PharmEasy customer.
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Amit,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #656213721525551104-39878, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 07th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.      We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Amit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656213721525551104-39878, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 07th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Noora,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regard to your concern, I request you to please elaborate on your concern about why you want to cancel the order so that we will be able to assist you better.     I would request that you reconsider your decision regarding the cancellation of your order. Or kindly confirm whether you want to cancel the order or not, so we can take further action accordingly     Please be informed that we are unable to cancel an order once it is dispatched for delivery. If you still wish to cancel your order, you may refuse it at the time of delivery.      I appreciate your patience in the meantime.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Nagarjuna,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regard to promotional SMS, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.     Please be assured, I have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number 9080324465 from receiving promotional SMS. It will take 3 working days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information. Also, if you have a dual SIM phone, I would request you to help us with the second number as well. We will forward a request for the other number as well.      Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email ID too, I request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.     I certainly hope this helps, and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Nagarjuna,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regard to promotional SMS, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.

Please be assured, I have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number 9080324465 from receiving promotional SMS. It will take 3 working days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information. Also, if you have a dual SIM phone, I would request you to help us with the second number as well. We will forward a request for the other number as well. 

Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email ID too, I request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.

I certainly hope this helps, and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

Hello Aunkar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regard to your concern raised with us for the order #653425161168314368-85416.

As per our records, our delivery executive tried multiple times to reach out to you for the order delivery; however, they were unable to connect with you. Hence, the order was cancelled.

We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba
